fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Check someone each night. You have a 75% chance of roleblocking them and a 25% chance of roleblocking them.
-Hang out with someone each night. You have a 75% chance of learning their faction and a 25% chance of learning their faction.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Half of all the factions "count as good".
-You are Town and Mafia at once.
